title: Episode 279: Kiss & Tell (Feat. Hitmaka)
itunes:title: Episode 279: Kiss & Tell (Feat. Hitmaka)
description:
Producer, Hitmaka addresses his salacious interview with Drink Champs. He admits his wrongs and apologizes for bringing up names when speaking on old sex stories. Aside from this, Hitmaka shares a touching story in which he was excited to be a father but the woman had an abortion without consulting, & he even explains what happened to his head when it was terribly swollen! 

Use code ANGELAYEE20 at checkout when purchasing all Urban Skin RX products.
